DOC.brief_summary: This proposal test Balance Adolescent Lifestyle Activities Nutrition Choices Energy ( BALANCE ) , multilevel intervention administer Parents Teachers ( PAT ) design reduce overweight postpartum teen . The intervention focus replacement 'obesogenic ' pattern ( high soda intake , excess portion size , sedentary activity ) 'energy ' pattern ( water consumption , appropriate portion size , walk ) .
DOC.brief_title: Achieving Energy Balance Post Partum Teens
DOC.criteria: 12 20 year age less 1 year post partum current participant Parents Teachers currently pregnant
